sentences.en: A large quantity of beer was sold.
A large quantity of water is stored in the reservoir.
After some initial problems, acetone was successfully produced in quantity.
sentences.cn: 解决了最初的一些问题之后，终于成功地制造出了大量丙酮。

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: He is an unknown quantity for his rivals.
sentences.cn: 对于对手们而言，他是个未知数。

sentences.en: How can such a large quantity of know - ledge be acquired?
sentences.cn: 这么大量的知识怎样才能学到 呢 ?

sentences.en: In algebra, the sign X usually denotes an unknown quantity.
sentences.cn: 在代数里, 符号X常用来表示未知数.

sentences.en: In production, we demand not only quantity but also quality.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品不但要求数量多,而且要求质量高.

sentences.en: In terms of quantity, production grew faster than ever before.
sentences.cn: 从数量上看，产量增长的速度比以往任何时期都要快。

sentences.en: Prices vary according to the quantity ordered.
sentences.cn: 价格随订购数量不同而有所变化。

sentences.en: She was burdened with a large quantity of parcels.
sentences.cn: 她吃力地捧着一大堆包裹.

sentences.en: The sheer quantity of detail would bemuse even the most clear-headed author.
sentences.cn: 光是这么多的细节就会让哪怕是头脑最清醒的作者感到困惑。

sentences.en: There are only a small quantity of flowers left in the garden.
sentences.cn: 花园里只剩下少量的花了.

sentences.en: To her the outside world was a totally unknown quantity.
sentences.cn: 对她来说,外部世界完全是个未知数.

sentences.en: Your work has improved in quantity and quality this term.
sentences.cn: 这学期你的作业在完成数量和质量上都有提高。

words.tran_cn: [数][语] 量词；数量词；精于计算的人

phrases.tran_cn: 订货量；订购量；订单数量

trans.tran_en: an amount of something that can be counted or measured
